mapper.select: SELECT * FROM toon t JOIN member m ON t.writerId = m.username WHERE (m.ENABLEd=3=m.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{toonVO.search}, '%')) OR (t.toontitle LIKE CONCAT('%', #{toonVO.search}, '%'))
SELECT * FROM toon t JOIN member m ON t.writerId = m.username
SELECT * FROM toon t JOIN member m ON t.writerId = m.username WHERE t.state=0 AND t.toonDay=#{toonVO.toonDay} GROUP BY t.toonNum ORDER BY t.totalHit DESC
SELECT * FROM toon t JOIN member m ON t.writerId = m.username WHERE t.state=0 AND t.toonDay=#{toonVO.toonDay} ORDER BY ratingSum/ratingPerson DESC

SELECT * FROM toon t LEFT JOIN member m ON t.writerId = m.username JOIN eachep e ON t.toonNum = e.toonNum WHERE t.state=0 AND t.toonDay=#{toonVO.toonDay} GROUP BY t.toonNum ORDER BY max(e.epDate) DESC
SELECT * FROM toon t JOIN member m ON t.writerId = m.username WHERE genre=#{toonVO.genre} AND state=0 ORDER BY totalHit DESC
SELECT * FROM toon t JOIN member m ON t.writerId = m.username WHERE genre=#{toonVO.genre} AND state=0 ORDER BY ratingSum/ratingPerson DESC
SELECT * FROM toon t LEFT JOIN member m ON t.writerId = m.username JOIN eachep e ON t.toonNum = e.toonNum WHERE genre=#{toonVO.genre} AND state=0 GROUP BY t.toonNum ORDER BY max(e.epDate) DESC
SELECT * FROM toon t JOIN member m ON t.writerId = m.username WHERE state=0 ORDER BY totalHit DESC LIMIT 21
SELECT * FROM toon t JOIN member m ON t.writerId = m.username WHERE state=0 ORDER BY ratingSum/ratingPerson DESC LIMIT 21
SELECT * FROM toon t LEFT JOIN member m ON t.writerId = m.username JOIN eachep e ON t.toonNum = e.toonNum WHERE state=0 GROUP BY t.toonNum ORDER BY max(e.epDate) DESC LIMIT 21
SELECT * FROM toon t JOIN member m ON t.writerId = m.username WHERE state=1 ORDER BY totalHit DESC
SELECT * FROM toon t JOIN member m ON t.writerId = m.username WHERE state=1 ORDER BY ratingSum/ratingPerson DESC
SELECT * FROM toon t LEFT JOIN member m ON t.writerId = m.username JOIN eachep e ON t.toonNum = e.toonNum WHERE state=1 GROUP BY t.toonNum ORDER BY max(e.epDate) DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE toon t LEFT JOIN review r ON t.toonNum=r.toonNum SET t.ratingSum= t.ratingSum+r.rating, t.ratingPerson=t.ratingPerson+1 WHERE t.toonNum=#{toonNum}
UPDATE toon t LEFT JOIN review r ON t.toonNum=r.toonNum SET t.ratingSum= t.ratingSum-r.rating, t.ratingPerson=t.ratingPerson-1 WHERE t.toonNum=#{toonNum}
